jobDescription: The Matawan Montessori Academy in Matawan, New Jersey is offering a full-time primary lead teacher position to an AMI/AMS certified applicant for the upcoming school year.  Established in 2009, our aim is to educate our community on the philosophy of Montessori. As we grow, we seek passionate, patient and nurturing teachers to join our team in maintaining exceptional childcare with strong connections to the Montessori philosophy.  The ideal candidate uses their knowledge of the Montessori materials according to lesson plans and is able to vary the instructional materials used to each individual child’s need. The teacher is able to assess the developmental needs of the children and encourage them to develop social skills appropriately. The teacher is also responsible for parent lecture series through the school year and conducting appropriate communication with their parents and team.  For more information on our school or to contact us please email us at matawanmontessori@gmail.com or check out our website at www.matawanmontessori.com
